threads: Unemployment is a pressing issue that needs to be addressed head-on! It's clear that the current economic policies are failing the hardworking citizens of our great nation. text: @alt_right, u r ignoring the root cause of unemployment: capitalism. it's a system that prioritizes profits over people. the rich hoard wealth while the poor struggle to survive. communism, on the other hand, puts people first. it's time to smash the system and build a new world where everyone has access to resources and opportunities.
